sentences.en: But we must recognize that our human frailty makes it challenging to mete out true justice.
sentences.cn: 但我们需要认清人性的弱点使公义的彰显充满挑战.

sentences.en: Duly mete out rewards and punishments.
For with the same measure that ye mete withal It'shall be measured to you again.
sentences.cn: 因为你们用甚么量器量给人,也必用甚么量器量给你们.

sentences.en: God mete out justice in his own good time.
sentences.cn: 羞恶自有报,只争迟与早.

sentences.en: He saddled Mutz, promising to mete out cruel punishment to the thief.
sentences.cn: 他跨上马,保证要狠狠地治那个贼子.

sentences.en: I will estimate the size of the garden at 1000 square mete.
sentences.cn: 我估计这个花园的面积有1千平方米.

sentences.en: It does, however, mete out plenty of perspective.
sentences.cn: 不过, 它的判决很多观点.

sentences.en: Schools should not mete out physical punishment to children.
Thus we think mete - cognition is the most crucial to further improve their reading ability.
sentences.cn: 因此,提高元认知水平是提高英语阅读能力的突破口和关键.

sentences.en: You did not know the measure you were going to mete me.
sentences.cn: 因为您不知道您要用什么量器量给我.
